Type.Name: CellLayout

TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract CellLayout implements class GLib.IWrapper

Type.ThreadSafetyStatement: Gtk# is thread aware, but not thread safe; See the Gtk# Thread Programming for details.

MemberSignature.Value: public void AddAttribute (Gtk.CellRenderer cell, string attribute, int column);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void AddAttribute(class Gtk.CellRenderer cell, string attribute, int32 column) cil managed

Docs.summary: Adds an attribute mapping to the list for this cell layout.
Docs.remarks: The is the column of the model to get a value from, and the is the parameter on to be set from the value. So for example if column 2 of the model contains strings, you could have the "text" attribute of a get its values from column 2.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Clear() cil managed

Docs.summary: Unsets all the mappings on all renderers for this cell layout.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void ClearAttributes(class Gtk.CellRenderer cell) cil managed

Docs.summary: Clears all existing attributes previously set with .

MemberSignature.Value: public void PackEnd (Gtk.CellRenderer cell, bool expand);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void PackEnd(class Gtk.CellRenderer cell, bool expand) cil managed

Docs.param: a , TRUE if is to be given extra space allocated to this cell layout.
Docs.summary: Adds the to the end of the cell layout.
Docs.remarks: If is FALSE, then the cell is allocated no more space than it needs. Any unused space is divided evenly between cells for which is TRUE.

MemberSignature.Value: public void PackStart (Gtk.CellRenderer cell, bool expand);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void PackStart(class Gtk.CellRenderer cell, bool expand) cil managed

Docs.param: a , TRUE if is to be given extra space allocated to this cell layout.
Docs.summary: Packs into the beginning of the cell layout.
Docs.remarks: If is FALSE, then the cell is allocated no more space than it needs. Any unused space is divided evenly between cells for which is TRUE.

MemberSignature.Value: public void Reorder (Gtk.CellRenderer cell, int position);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Reorder(class Gtk.CellRenderer cell, int32 position) cil managed

Docs.remarks: Note that has already to be packed into the cell layout for this to function properly.

MemberSignature.Value: public void SetAttributes (Gtk.CellRenderer renderer, object[] attrs);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void SetAttributes(class Gtk.CellRenderer renderer, object[] attrs) cil managed

Docs.summary: Sets the attribute to model column bindings for a renderer.
Docs.remarks: The array should consist of pairs of attribute names and column indices.

MemberSignature.Value: public void SetCellDataFunc (Gtk.CellRenderer cell, Gtk.CellLayoutDataFunc func);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void SetCellDataFunc(class Gtk.CellRenderer cell, class Gtk.CellLayoutDataFunc func) cil managed

Docs.summary: Sets up a data function for this layout.
Docs.remarks: The data function is used instead of the standard attributes mapping for setting the column value, and should set the value of the layout's cell renderer(s) as appropriate. may be to remove an older one.
